content: write a letter in the style of Phil Farber who is a well-known a hypnotist, Neuro linguistic programming practitioner and similar topics. He is an instructor who presents his powerful, innovative techniques internationally. He's been a faculty member at the National Guild of Hypnotists, a student of Robert Anton Wilson and he embodies in every way, and he also embodies Richard Bandler and he also embodies terrence mckenna in every way but especially in how he views marihuana as a way to elevate consciousness and be a spiritual ally. Phil does life changing work. Phil has the ability to bring people to aplace of huge healing really fast and easy with all the techniques he has learned throughout his life. When you hear him speak or you read his works, you feel like you whole life is falling magickally into place. He is a practition of magick. Phil's trance-induction is amazing. In addition to the long term benefits of his work, listening to him and doing his ceremonies leaves you feeling both relaxed and excited. His words leave you on a high trance-state afterglow for hours! His results with helping people with his words have long term effects that are felt for years to come. Phil's letter is written to his favorite student and confidant Zipporah.
